main event: A UFO sighting was reported on the evening of 8 August 1964 in Brookville, Long Island, New York.
interesting points: The sighting involved an Air Force reserve officer and his wife as witnesses., The object was described as star-shaped with a tail at a 90° angle., The sighting lasted for about 3 to 5 minutes., The object was observed at 85° above the horizon to the north., The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a star-shaped object with a tail
location: Brookville, Long Island, New York, USA
witness description: an Air Force reserve officer and his wife
